question: A sum of money at simple interest amounts to Rs. 815 in 3 years and to Rs. 854 in 4 years. The sum is:
answer_description: S.I. for 1 year = Rs. (854 - 815) = Rs. 39.S.I. for 3 years = Rs.(39 x 3) = Rs. 117.Principal = Rs. (815 - 117) = Rs. 698.
